column2: UPDATE 1-Chinese users criticise Microsoft's push for Windows 10 upgrade-Xinhua SHANGHAI
column3: May 27 Chinese users of Microsoft  products are criticising the software company's push to get them to mandatorily upgrade their Windows operating systems
column4: the official Xinhua news agency reported on Friday.

column2: Court sets June 7 hearing on Viacom CEO's removal from Redstone trust A Massachusetts court has scheduled a June 7 hearing on Viacom  Chief Executive Philippe Dauman's removal from the trust that will control the media company when Sumner Redstone dies or is deemed incapacitated.
